div.head: ¶ I. H. in prayse of Florio.
div.l: For profit Gardners plant, the husbandman for gaine
Doth til the earth, hoping the seed shal counteruaile his paine.
Our Florio dooth not so, his trauaile yet dooth passe
The Gardners, or the Husbandmans, or toylings of the Asse.
For when the byrd, the fish, the foule, ioyied in their quiet rest,
In Closet close was his delight, no sleepe his eyes opprest.
On craggi Rockes, and stony plottes, wel may he thinke his seede
Is sowne, if that no woorthy thankes we yeeld hym for his meede.
